slides.title: Algebraic Identities - Part 1
slides.content:
**(a + b)² = a² + 2ab + b²**

**(a - b)² = a² - 2ab + b²**

**(a + b)(a - b) = a² - b²**

**Example:** (x+3)² = x² + 6x + 9

slides.title: Algebraic Identities - Part 2
slides.content:
**(a + b)³ = a³ + b³ + 3ab(a + b)**

**(a - b)³ = a³ - b³ - 3ab(a - b)**

**a³ + b³ = (a + b)(a² - ab + b²)**

**a³ - b³ = (a - b)(a² + ab + b²)**

slides.title: Linear Equations
slides.content:
**Form:** ax + b = 0

**Solution:** x = -b/a

**Example:** 2x + 6 = 0
x = -6/2 = -3

**Two variables:** ax + by = c
Solve using substitution or elimination

slides.title: Quadratic Equations
slides.content:
**Form:** ax² + bx + c = 0

**Formula:**
x = [-b ± √(b² - 4ac)] / 2a

**Discriminant:** D = b² - 4ac
- D > 0: Two real roots
- D = 0: One real root
- D < 0: No real roots

slides.title: Factorization
slides.content:
**Common factor:** ax + ay = a(x + y)

**Middle term split:**
x² + 5x + 6 = (x + 2)(x + 3)

**Difference of squares:**
x² - 9 = (x + 3)(x - 3)

**Perfect square:**
x² + 6x + 9 = (x + 3)²
